inclusion.criterion: Patients in whom transcatheter aortic valve implantation is attempted at participating center.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient underwent a cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate his pulm art pressures which showed no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease, and he was sent home from cardiology clinic with Lasix and BB (which he did not tolerate), continued to have worsening SOB and LE edema and finally presented here for evaluation.

notes: Unknown: patient's current medical status and treatment plan, but he is a candidate for transcatheter aortic valve implantation.
